sound
Class Sine

java.lang.Object
  sound.Sine

public class Sine
extends java.lang.Object

The Sine class produces a sine wave based on a series of parameters that are used to generate the application notes.

Version:
0.6 April 27, 2009 Copyright 2011 Vladimir Chaloupka. All rights reserved.
Author:
Gavin Shriver

Constructor Detail

Sine

public Sine()
Contstructs a blank Sine Object and prints out Exception if anything goes wrong.

Sine

public Sine(int numRandTones)
Constructs a Sine Object with defaults for multi-random tone generation with random play and rest times

Parameters:
numRandTones - The int amount of random tones to to generate.

Sine

public Sine(int numRandTones,
            double finiteToneTime,
            double finiteRestTime)
Constructs a Sine Object with defaults for multi-random tone generation with finite play and rest times

Parameters:
numRandTones - The int number of random tones
finiteToneTime - The double duration of the tone
finiteRestTime - The double duration of the rest between tones

Plays a frequency for a particular duration without creating a Sine object

Parameters:
frequency - The frequency to be generated
seconds - The duration the generated frequency should last
